Name: Witch
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with a Witch Staff.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

At the start of the magic step select a friendly Formation within 9" of this model. Until the end of the step, whenever this model would attempt to cast Witching Hex, you can measure range and line of sight from the selected Formation.

Spells.Name: Witching Hex (30)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy Formation within 9" of this model and roll a D6. On a result of 3+ (or 6+ if the selected Formation is LEGENDARY) the selected Formation suffers D3 ethereal damage and must half the result of any charges it attempts until the end of the round. In addition, if the selected Formation is a CASTER subtract X from your opponent’s magic pool where X is the amount of damage inflicted by this Magic Spell.
